### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.cleveland.com/advice/2024/06/dear-abby-should-i-let-them-know-aging-father-plans-to-leave-assets-to-charity-not-family-members.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cleveland.com%2Fadvice%2F2024%2F06%2Fdear-abby-should-i-let-them-know-aging-father-plans-to-leave-assets-to-charity-not-family-members.html) ### Comment > Other tkts for same issue on other websites are 182517, 180077, 182340, 182176, 181350. > > On one of those tickets yoh asked me to enable the annoyance filters. With the filter enabled, for this report, I get a blank white page instead of content. With the filters off, I get the pop-up that an adblocker has been detected. I didn't retry all the other ticker numbers with the annoyance filters enabled but I did do a few the other day and updated those tickets. They have the same behavior as what I'm experiencing here so I would assume even the untested ones would do the same. These websites are from links from the Google Discover feed. They have the same exact behavior if I try to open them in the Google app as they do on Chrome ### Screenshots

issue.title: www.javatpoint.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/175538) if other issue.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.cleveland.com/advice/2024/06/dear-abby-should-i-let-them-know-aging-father-plans-to-leave-assets-to-charity-not-family-members.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cleveland.com%2Fadvice%2F2024%2F06%2Fdear-abby-should-i-let-them-know-aging-father-plans-to-leave-assets-to-charity-not-family-members.html) ### Comment > Other tkts for same issue on other websites are 182517, 180077, 182340, 182176, 181350. > > On one of those tickets yoh asked me to enable the annoyance filters. With the filter enabled, for this report, I get a blank white page instead of content. With the filters off, I get the pop-up that an adblocker has been detected. I didn't retry all the other ticker numbers with the annoyance filters enabled but I did do a few the other day and updated those tickets. They have the same behavior as what I'm experiencing here so I would assume even the untested ones would do the same. These websites are from links from the Google Discover feed. They have the same exact behavior if I try to open them in the Google app as they do on Chrome ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Looks like JS rules are working then (as those domains not showing up).
Please add these two rules to user filter (one line, one rule):
```
cleaveland.com,nj.com#@%#//scriptlet('abort-current-inline-script', 'document.createElement', '/admiral|String\.fromCharCode\(97,( )*?100,( )*?109,( )*?105,( )*?114,( )*?97,( )*?108\)|a%64%6d%69%72%61%6c|adm%69%72%61l|%61%64m%69r%61l|-engaged[\s\S]*?googletag[\s\S]*?decodeURI/')
cleaveland.com,nj.com#@%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'admiral', 'noopFunc')
```

If you have the same behaviour for another page, just add the domain name in front of the rule seperating the other domains with ,

With the filter enabled, for this report, I get a blank white page instead of content. With the filters off, I get the pop-up that an adblocker has been detected. I didn't retry all the other ticker numbers with the annoyance filters enabled but I did do a few the other day and updated those tickets. They have the same behavior as what I'm experiencing here so I would assume even the untested ones would do the same. These websites are from links from the Google Discover feed. They have the same exact behavior if I try to open them in the Google app as they do on Chrome ### Screenshots

### Issue URL (Ads) [http://kissmanga.net](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fkissmanga.net) ### Comment > Recently I accidentally pressed disable adblocker on some website and I immediately turned it back on and everything went back to normal. I go to my favorite site to read manga and notice I’m getting ads so I decided to see if AdGuard was on and it was, as I used the site more I noticed I got more ads, some for anime and some for nsfw things. After that encounter it seems as if AdGuard gave up on my phone and it blocks virtually nothing now and I don’t want to mess with it and make it worse. Username: `@celebisme ` ### Screenshots

comment.body:
We have the necessary rule:
`##.c-ads`
it is present in the optimized Base filter and General content blocker file. But it is not applied.
It does not work only if added to General CB. If added to all - applied. Checked with following lines in the **custom filter**:

```
!#safari_cb_affinity(all)
##.c-ads
!#safari_cb_affinity
```

`##base` also does not work, but applied on another sites.

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://rewardplatform.jp/dsugotoku/1476799](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Frewardplatform.jp%2Fdsugotoku%2F1476799) ### Comment > スマホ限定かつアカウント必要かつ有料サイトとなります。 > > 可能なら対応を、対応不可であれば助言を頂きたいです。 > > サイト自体は1枚目のスクショのもので、印をつけた部分からサイトに移動するとポイントがもらえるというものです。1度移動するとリンクごと表示は消えます。 > > こちらがAdGuardオンだとサイトへの遷移はしますが、リンクもきえず、判定されないようです。 > > 原因は日本語フィルタ内の > ||mopo.jp^$third-party > ではあったのですが、3つブロックされており(除外ルール適用後のログ添付)最適な除外ルールが難しく、現在ざっくり、 > ||mopo.jp^ > をマイルールに入れて対応しております。 > > これでサイトは完全に動作はして、他の広告に遭遇とかは今のところないのですが、対応可能ならお願いしたいです。mopo.jp自体は以前のようなアフィリエイトはもうやっていないと思うのですがそのあたりはよくわかりません。 Username: `@White00100` ### Screenshots

comment.body:
У себя подобной рекламы не наблюдаю. Судя по скриншоту, используется обычный сертификат, т.е. сайт грузится как есть.
Попробуйте открыть его без `KES` и обратить внимание на то, какой сертификат используется в браузере. Работу программы можно также проверить [здесь](https://adguard.com/test.html).
Расширение экстры не обязательно устанавливать в браузер - уже есть в программе.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/172033

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://rewardplatform.jp/dsugotoku/1476799](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Frewardplatform.jp%2Fdsugotoku%2F1476799) ### Comment > スマホ限定かつアカウント必要かつ有料サイトとなります。 > > 可能なら対応を、対応不可であれば助言を頂きたいです。 > > サイト自体は1枚目のスクショのもので、印をつけた部分からサイトに移動するとポイントがもらえるというものです。1度移動するとリンクごと表示は消えます。 > > こちらがAdGuardオンだとサイトへの遷移はしますが、リンクもきえず、判定されないようです。 > > 原因は日本語フィルタ内の > ||mopo.jp^$third-party > ではあったのですが、3つブロックされており(除外ルール適用後のログ添付)最適な除外ルールが難しく、現在ざっくり、 > ||mopo.jp^ > をマイルールに入れて対応しております。 > > これでサイトは完全に動作はして、他の広告に遭遇とかは今のところないのですが、対応可能ならお願いしたいです。mopo.jp自体は以前のようなアフィリエイトはもうやっていないと思うのですがそのあたりはよくわかりません。 Username: `@White00100` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/gu1uu4pklpssw80ww8oso8wwoc40kg86t32kffedww.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
> @White00100 Please make screenshot of details of blocked `mopo.jp` request(s).
> 
> > 除外ルールの説明のアットマーク2つが抜けていますね。(反映されないのですかね？)
> 
> Please use `code` tag "`":
> 
> ```
> `@@||example.com^`
> ```

今はユーザールールで除外しておりますが、ブロックされていたものは最初に貼り付けたもので全てです。
最初のスクリーンショットの一番上の赤丸から遷移したときに発生するのが今回載せた3件をブロックしており、その他だと
click?ID=
の先が異なるものに、なっています。
上から2番目をクリックした場合のスクショを貼っておきます。
![Screenshot_20240629-200214](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/103641927/a7779583-8d3f-451e-bb51-b24f4a902396)
![Screenshot_20240629-200227](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/103641927/da5fe9a1-7965-42dc-b952-bff47e718e9f)

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/172033

issue.title: lloydsbankinggroup.tt.omtrdc.net

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [http://lloydsbankinggroup.tt.omtrdc.net](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Flloydsbankinggroup.tt.omtrdc.net)
### Comment
> Hello, hope you are well.
> 
> The Lloyds UK banking app does not work, hence why i could not upload a screenshot as the app prohibits it.
> 
> With dns.adguard.com enabled the app will endless authenticate as soon and then as you disable the dns it with authenticate normally. 
> 
> This is an issue effecting OISB blocker and Next DNS as well and these are the URL you need to allow for the app to work again.
> 
> online-metrix.net
> 
> *.mboxedge37.tt.omtrdc.net
> 
> *.lloydsbankinggroup.d3.sc.omtrdc.net
> 
> *.cem.lloydsbank.co.uk
> 
> *.lloydsbankinggroup.tt.omtrdc.net
> 
> Here is a couple of reddit post on the issue seems to be happening more recently.
> 
> 1) https://www.reddit.com/r/nextdns/comments/1drgsv3/lloyds_uk_banking_app_blocked_by_nextdns/
> 
> 2) https://www.reddit.com/r/nextdns/comments/xpw9jq/oisd_blocking_lloyds_and_halifax_banking_app_from/
> 
> Kind Regards
> Joe

### Screenshots
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 </summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/n4cbg6o3ihwwkkc40c0sowsw8cwkow0s78ru4ltiqs.png?nc=1)
</details>
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled</summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/392cbpwpxt6okg0s4k88okscgg4wwworqn59cveuj4.png?nc=1)
</details>

### System configuration

Information | Value
--- | ---

System version: | Galaxy s24 Ultra 
Browser: | Chrome

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.facebook.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2F) ### Comment > With adblock enabled the facebook site uses about 10-15% of my CPU. Disabling adblock returns the CPU usage to the expect 0-1%, Other "feed based" sites do not have this issue and I've experienced only mild CPU usage on youtube due to it's new environment shade background. ### Screenshots
